task.title: Remove The Drawband
task.shortdesc: If any repairs or replacements to the drawband or mainspring are required, you must first remove the drawband from the spring barrel.

step.cmd: Locate the point of connection where the drawband meets the spring barrel.
step.info: The spring's end has a knot or metal hook attached to the mainspring barrel by sliding into a thin slot through a hole in the barrel. The hole is sufficient for removal of the knot/hook, but the narrow slot holds the knot/hook in place.

step.cmd: Grab the drawband with a pair of needle nosed pliers and gently slide it out of the thin barrel slot, guiding it all of the way out through the hole in the barrel.
